comments: Number of compositions of n into parts 6, 7, and 8. [_Joerg Arndt_, Jun 27 2013]
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (0,0,0,0,0,1,1,1).
formula: a(n) = a(n-6) +a(n-7) +a(n-8) for n>7. - _Vincenzo Librandi_, Jun 27 2013
prog: (MAGMA) m:=70; R<x>:=PowerSeriesRing(Integers(), m); Coefficients(R!(1/(1-x^6-x^7-x^8))); /* or */ I:=[1,0,0,0,0,0,1,1]; [n le 8 select I[n] else Self(n-6)+Self(n-7)+Self(n-8): n in [1..70]]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Jun 27 2013
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
